name: Barooka chessplosion! - knightrider edition
description:
Capture all kings!

Made in 48 hours by me alone. Submitted in Jam rather than Compo because I started (and finished) one day late.

Chess assets are from https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:SVG_chess_pieces. All other assets were made by me. The tools used include Unity, Gimp, Affinity Photo, makewordart.com and VS code.
